mapper.select: select user_gender as gender, count(user_gender) as cnt from t_user group by user_gender

select trunc(months_between(sysdate, user_birthday)/12+1, -1) as age, count(trunc(months_between(sysdate, user_birthday)/12+1, -1)) as cnt from t_user group by trunc(months_between(sysdate, user_birthday)/12+1, -1) order by age asc

select br.branch_code as branchCode, schedule_date as scheduleDate, count(schedule_date) as scheduleCnt, (sum(sh.schedule_total_seat) -sum(sh.schedule_empty_seat)) as bookedSeats, sum(sh.schedule_total_seat) as totalSeats from t_schedule sh, t_branch br where sh.branch_code = br.branch_code group by br.branch_code, schedule_date order by br.branch_code

select br.branch_name, sum(bk.booking_price) as sum from t_booking bk, t_branch br, t_schedule sh where bk.schedule_code = sh.schedule_code and sh.branch_code = br.branch_code and schedule_date between trunc(to_date(#{value}) , 'iw')-6 and trunc(to_date(#{value}) , 'iw')+6 group by br.branch_name order by br.branch_name
